I don't feel like running, but missing training will make fell like a failure.

I understand your apprehensions, and it's natural to have such thoughts. However, remember, progress comes with patience and persistence. Missing one session won't define your journey. Let's reset, regain focus, and try a more comfortable pace today. We'll build from there
I am having a lot of pain in my left leg, I am not going to run.

Pain should never be ignored. Your well-being matters most. Take some time to rest, recover, and seek medical advice if needed. Once the issue resolves, we'll get back to running stronger than before. In the meantime, let's explore alternative exercises to maintain fitness.
